meanings.definition: A title or heading printed at the top of a page or section.
meanings.sent1: The supertitle at the beginning of the chapter helped me understand what it was about.
meanings.sent2: The supertitle of the article made it easy to find the information I needed.
meanings.sent3: I always look at the supertitle first to decide if I want to read the rest of the text.
meanings.sent4: The supertitle acted like a guide, leading me through the content of the document.
meanings.sent5: The bright red supertitle caught my attention immediately.

meanings.definition: A translation or paraphrase of dialogue or lyrics projected above a stage during a performance.
meanings.sent1: The supertitle helped the audience follow along with the foreign language opera.
meanings.sent2: The supertitle displayed the English translation of the song lyrics for the audience.
meanings.sent3: The supertitle made the play even funnier with its witty translations.
meanings.sent4: The supertitle floated above the stage like a magical cloud of words.
meanings.sent5: The supertitle illuminated the meaning of the song for everyone to enjoy.
